summary: "The Three-Body Problem" is a popular science fiction novel by Chinese author Liu Cixin. Published in 2008, it's the first book in a trilogy about Earth's encounter with aliens from a three-star system. The story was first published in a magazine and won the Galaxy Award in 2006. The English version, translated by Ken Liu, came out in 2014 and won the Hugo Award for Best Novel. It has been adapted into a Chinese TV series and an upcoming Netflix show.
title: The Three-Body Problem (novel)
